name: Arabilis: Super Harvest
description:
Arabilis: Super Harvest has an unique blend of farming and arcade puzzle gameplay. You are planting and growing vegetables in 40 different gardens, spread across 4 unique seasons.  A harvester will harvest your grown vegetables but be careful not to waste any seeds. Each year the player passes in the game, the difficulty and amount of challenges the player faces will increase. How far will you make it?

Features: 

  •  40 unique garden levels. 
  • 4 seasons, each with a unique look and feel. 
  •  Gardens can contain random: 
    •  Different weather conditions. 
    • Usable items. 
    • Animals that steal or manipulate your crops. 
  • Play in Arabilis Mode or Relax Mode.
